00040 require_once($MODEL_PATH.'model.php');
00041 
00042 class Freshclam extends Model
00043 {
00044     public $Name= 'freshclam';
00045     public $User= '_clamav';
00046     
00047     public $NVPS= '\h';
00048     public $ConfFile= '/etc/freshclam.conf';
00049     public $LogFile= '/var/log/freshclam.log';
00050     
00051     public $PidFile= '/var/run/clamav/freshclam.pid';
00052     
00053     function Freshclam()
00054     {
00055         global $TmpFile;
00056         
00057         parent::Model();
00058         
00059         $this->StartCmd= "/usr/local/bin/freshclam -d > $TmpFile 2>&1 &";
00060     
00061         $this->Commands= array_merge(
00062             $this->Commands,
00063             array(
00064                 'GetMirrors'=>  array(
00065                     'argv'  =>  array(),
00066                     'desc'  =>  _('Get database mirrors'),
00067                     ),
00068                 
00069                 'AddMirror'=>   array(
00070                     'argv'  =>  array(URL),
00071                     'desc'  =>  _('Add database mirror'),
00072                     ),
00073                 
00074                 'DelMirror'=>   array(
00075                     'argv'  =>  array(URL),
00076                     'desc'  =>  _('Delete database mirror'),
00077                     ),
00078                 )
00079             );
00080     }
00081     
00083     function ParseLogLine($logline, &$cols)
00084     {
00085         // Mon Oct 26 05:23:56 2009 -> ClamAV update process started at Mon Oct 26 05:23:56 2009
00086         $re_datetime= '\w+\s+(\w+\s+\d+)\s+(\d+:\d+:\d+)\s+\d+';
00087         $re_rest= '(.*)';
00088 
00089         $re= "/^$re_datetime\s+->\s+$re_rest$/";
00090         if (preg_match($re, $logline, $match)) {
00091             $cols['Date']= $match[1];
00092             $cols['Time']= $match[2];
00093             $cols['DateTime']= $cols['Date'].' '.$cols['Time'];
00094             $cols['Log']= $match[3];
00095             return TRUE;
00096         }
00097         else if ($this->ParseSyslogLine($logline, $cols)) {
00098             $cols['DateTime']= $cols['Date'].' '.$cols['Time'];
00099             return TRUE;
00100         }
00101         else {
00102             $cols['Log']= $logline;
00103             return TRUE;
00104         }
00105         return FALSE;       
00106     }
00107 
00108     function GetMirrors()
00109     {
00110         $mirrors= $this->SearchFileAll($this->ConfFile, "/^\h*DatabaseMirror\h*([\w.]+)\b.*\h*$/m");
00111         // Do not list the main server
00112         return preg_replace('/^(\s*database\.clamav\.net\s*)/m', '', $mirrors);
00113     }
00114     
00115     function AddMirror($mirror)
00116     {
00117         $this->DelMirror($mirror);
00118         return $this->ReplaceRegexp($this->ConfFile, "/(\h*DatabaseMirror\h+database\.clamav\.net.*)/m", "DatabaseMirror $mirror\n".'${1}');
00119     }
00120 
00121     function DelMirror($mirror)
00122     {
00123         // Do not delete the main server
00124         if ($mirror !== 'database.clamav.net') {
00125             $mirror= Escape($mirror, '.');
00126             return $this->ReplaceRegexp($this->ConfFile, "/^(\h*DatabaseMirror\h+$mirror\b.*(\s|))/m", '');
00127         }
00128         ViewError(_("Won't delete database.clamav.net entry."));
00129         return FALSE;
00130     }
00131 }
